content.prompt: The sculpture shown can be attributed to the same culture that produced the

choices.label: Peplos Kore from the Acropolis in Athens
votive figures from the Sumerian Square Temple at Eshnunna
seated scribe from the Egyptian tomb at Saqqara
sculpture of Apollo from the Etruscan temple at Veii

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
